mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ${fileSeriesStatTableName}( fid INTEGER, sid INTEGER, start_timestamp BIGINT NOT NULL, end_timestamp BIGINT NOT NULL, count INTEGER NOT NULL, miss_count INTEGER NOT NULL, special_count INTEGER NOT NULL, late_count INTEGER, redundancy_count INTEGER, value_count INTEGER, variation_count INTEGER, speed_count INTEGER, speed_change_count INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(fid, sid), FOREIGN KEY(fid) REFERENCES ${fileTableName}(fid) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY(sid) REFERENCES ${seriesTableName}(sid) ON DELETE CASCADE )
